work.title: Madac International Schools - IB School
work: Network administrator in all buildings of the institution (4 buildings)
Building the entire network structure and making explanatory diagrams
Establishing, programming, and equipping the network in 2 buildings

Programming a storage server (cloud) for the organization with many other accompanying services
Programming Windows Server (AD DS) with many rolls
Creating a server for the Internet of things and converting the IT office into a smart office
Create a web server and host websites
